text: The St. Anna Greek Catholic High School and Technical School (hungarian: Szent Anna Görögkatolikus Gimnázium és Technikum) is a high school in Budapest, maintained by the Hungarian Greek Catholic Church. == Education == Over the last decade, the institution has continuously renewed itself. Its educational structure is flexible, adapting to policy demands and future challenges. Their educational program emphasizes personal attention, nurturing talent, and helping students catch up. While Christian values guide the school's operations, they warmly welcome both faithful and searching young people. ==References== Category:Educational institutions in Hungary Category:Pages with unreviewed translations
title: St. Anna Greek Catholic High School and Technical School
